Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class DamagedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.Observer
      • it.polimi.se2019.controller.DamagedController
  • public class DamagedController
extends Observer
    Handles the use of a PowerUp with PowerUp.applicability equal to DAMAGED Handles effects with an arbitrary amount of marks and/or damages. Notifies the controller once it's ended thanks to the countDownLatch.

                         Player damaged,

                         java.util.List<PowerUp> applicable)
        Parameters:
        countDownLatch - latch notified when the DamagedController finishes its actions
        damaged - player damaged that is activating the powerUp
        damaging - player damaging that is gonna receive the shot from the damaged player
        applicable - powerUps that can be used by the damagedPlayer
